quote: When writing for children, it's important to keep in touch with our own inner child. What frightened them, made them happy, made them sad or angry?
author: C.J. Heck

quote: Just because a feeling is natural does not mean it should be indulged.
author: Roseanna M. White, A Stray Drop of Blood

quote: The moment when you dream of someone deeply at night and in the morning you see that person staring and smiling at you.For me there is no word to express that feeling.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: The old longing i had thought dead, rose in me like a flame
author: Sam Selvon

quote: One day you’re going to see her holding hands with someone who took your chance. She won’t even notice you because she’s too busy laughing with the stupid jokes he makes. And it will burn your heart seeing that beautiful smile on her face and realizing that you’re not the reason anymore. And then it will hit you: it was her, it was always her.
author: Elisabeth Van den Abeele

quote: Oh my gosh, he smells good, like some exotic but comforting spice, nutmeg or cardamom. Slowly Damian lowers his head to mine and I think my chest might explode, my heart is tap-dancing so qui
author: Lisa Ann Sandell, A Map of the Known World

quote: Let your feelings flow freely, accept each one of them, know that they are your feelings and no one is to blame for them. Live from your essence and watch your feelings flow; only when you accept them can you understand the story of your life.
author: Patricia Selbert, The House of Six Doors

quote: When I said these words, all the heat in my body seemed to rise to my face. I felt I might float up into the air, just like a piece of ash from a fire.
author: Arthur Golden, Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: As a devil's advocate Mr Neville was faultless. And yet, she knew, there was a flaw in his reasoning, just as there was a flaw in his ability to feel.
author: Anita Brookner, Hotel du Lac

quote: Even in your absence I fight with you in my mind, I laugh with you in my mind.That's how the strong connection exists between you and me. It will be forever.
author: Emma Brynstein

quote: You tell me I have to crush a field of babies to keep breathing? Sure. You say people who rely on me aren't going to live unless I turn someone's head into a bowl of gravy? I'm there. I don't feel bad about it. I don't think about it. It just is what it is. It's survival.
author: Robert Kirkman, The Walking Dead, Vol. 26: Call to Arms
tags: babies, feelings, gravy, it-is-what-it-is, negan, survival

quote: Feelings were clouds across the sky. They would change and pass. It wasn't important how she felt.
author: Suchen Christine Lim, A Bit Of Earth

quote: You can know something is a lie when it has no love in it.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: She left me, offended at my want of sympathy, and thinking, no doubt, that I envied her. I did not - at least, I firmly believed I did not.
author: Anne Brontë, Agnes Grey

quote: ...and yet, though desirous to be gone, she could not quit the mansion-house, or look an adieu to the cottage, with its black, dripping and comfortless veranda, or even notice through the misty glasses the last humble tenements of the village, without a saddened heart. Scenes had passed in Uppercross which made it precious. It stood the record of many sensations of pain, once severe, but now softened; and of some instances of relenting feeling, some breathings of friendship and reconciliation, which could never be looked for again, and which could never cease to be dear. She left it all behind her, all but the recollection that such things had been.
author: Jane Austen, Persuasion
tags: farewell, feelings, going-away, memories, parting, recollections, regret

quote: I think that's nice, and if I could have feelings at all I would have them for Deb.
author: Jeff Lindsay, Darkly Dreaming Dexter

quote: I remember I’ve never shared tears with someone that longedfor (me) and loved me; I didn’t know how to be compassionate.”(The truth, the lies & the love, p. 76)
author: Chimnese Davids, Muses of Wandering Passions

quote: So, what's up with you and Damian?" Helena
author: Lisa Ann Sandell, A Map of the Known World
tags: cora, damian, feelings, helena, love, shyness

quote: Not to expose your true feelings to an adult seems to be instinctive from the age of seven or eight onwards.
author: George Orwell

quote: It is true I little respect women or girls who are loquacious either in boasting the triumphs, or bemoaning the mortifications, of feelings.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: when you hate someone, at the same time, you grab that person and give a space in yourself for that person. that's when your hatred might turn into affection, into love.
author: Niratisaya

quote: He stared at Esmelda with a face like glass, nothing hidden. What I saw there wasn’t steel or fire or stone. Feelings stirred in me and I had to look away. I knew what I saw because I’d felt them, too — understanding, sadness, compassion...forgiveness.
author: Deborah Wheeler, Northlight

quote: I’ve suppressed my aspirations to forget all rationality and let the moment explain everything, for nothing to be said and everything understood. If only I knew how to let these feelings out.
author: Saim .A. Cheeda, Here & After
tags: aspirations, denial, emotions, feelings, if-only, love, moment, rationality, reciprocation, suppressing-emotions

quote: You know it's real when reality becomes a dream, the dream becomes real, and real feels unreal
author: Evy Michaels

quote: How we feel about our families teaches us and helps us know the importance of feeling.
author: Brent M. Jones

quote: I’d give you – if I thought one day you might return my feelings …
author: Eliza Granville, Gretel and the Dark

quote: He wasn't normally conscious of it, but there was one part of his body that was extremely sensitive, somewhere along his back. This soft, subtle spot he couldn't reach was usually covered by something, so that it was invisible to the naked eye. But when, for whatever reason, that spot became exposed and someone's finger pressed down on it, something inside him would stir. A special substance would be secreted, swiftly carried by his bloodstream to every corner of his body. That special stimulus was both a physical sensation and a mental one, creating vivid images in his mind.The first time he met Sara, he felt an anonymous finger reach out and push down forcefully on that trigger on his back. The day they met they talked for a long time, though he couldn't recall much of what they said. What he did recall was the special feeling on his back, and the indefinably thrilling sensation it brought to his mind and body. One part of him relaxed, one part tightened up. That sort of feeling. But what did it mean? Tsukuru thought about it for days, but he was not, by nature, adept at abstract thinking. So Tsukuru emailed Sara and invited her to dinner. He was determined to find out the meaning of that feeling, of that sensation.
author: Haruki Murakami, Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage

quote: They say Aslan is on the move- perhaps has already landed."And now a very curious thing happened. None of the children knew who Aslan was any more than you do; but the moment the Beaver had spoken these words everyone felt quite different. Perhaps it has sometimes happened to you in a dream that someone says something which you don't understand but in the dream it feels as if it has some enormous meaning- either a terrifying one which turns the whole dream into a nightmare or else a lovely meaning too lovely to put into words, which makes the dream so beautiful that you remember it all your life and are always wishing you could get into that dream again. It was like that now. At the name of Aslan each one of the children felt something jump in its inside. Edmund felt a sensation of mysterious horror. Peter felt suddenly brave and adventurous. Susan felt as if some delicious smell or some delightful strain of music had just floated by her. And Lucy got the feeling you have when you wake up in the morning and realize that it is the beginning of the holidays or the beginning of summer.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
tags: aslan, edmund-pevensie, feelings, lucy-pevensie, peter-pevensie, susan-pevensie

quote: Let them travel freely, from heart to lips.Feelings they are, don't cut them off at tips.
author: Drishti Bablani

quote: Me? I'm scared of everything. I'm scared of what I saw, I'm scared of what I did, of who I am, and most of all I'm scared of walking out of this room and never feeling the rest of my whole life the way I feel when I'm with you.
author: Frances "Baby" Houseman

quote: It's strange how many ways there are to miss someone. You miss the things they did and who they were, but you also miss who you were to them. The way everything you said and did was beautiful or entertaining or important. How much you mattered.
author: Robin Roe, A List of Cages
tags: feelings, letting-go, losing-someone, love, missing-someone, moving-on

quote: Some express, some write and some just feel it.
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel
tags: deep-thoughts, deeplove, feel, feel-it, feeling-love, feelings, justthewayifeel, love, love-is-incredible, mad-in-love, my-love-for-you, random-thoughts

quote: There are some places you can't visit anymore,poetry and writings take you there.
author: Vaishal sheth
tags: feelings, missing, night, place, poetry, writing

quote: Facts don't care about your feelings.
author: Ben Shapiro
tags: emotion, facts, feelings, logic, thinking, thought, truth

quote: Why did you run away last time?” William asks quietly, so quietly that at first, I think I’m imagining it...“Because you are dangerous for me,” I say in the same tone so that he is the only one who can hear me...“Because,” I say, but then I stop, my throat suddenly too dry.7…6…My tongue darts out to wet my lips before continuing in a hurry. “Because…”5…“You could be everything I ever wanted.” 4…3…“Everything and so much more.
author: Anna B. Doe, Lost & Found
tags: couple, feelings, insecurity, love, more, running-away

quote: Starlight is best felt at noon...
author: Will Advise
tags: blues, feeling, feelings, night, noon, starlight, stars

quote: All the bees knew Sugar; they carried their feelings for her with them in their genes, they could sense her from more than half a mile away and would no sooner find her a threat than fly to the moon. But Elizabeth the First sensed Grady Parkes from half a mile away too, and her resulting hum was not one of blissful content. It was his smell, partly: an aftershave, with base notes of tobacco and cedar and a hint of bitter herbs, and his natural scent, which was too sour for Elizabeth the First's liking. She registered him as something to watch out for and passed this on through the realm.
author: Sarah-Kate Lynch, The Wedding Bees: A Novel of Honey, Love, and Manners
tags: aftershave, bees, elizabeth-the-first, feelings, grady-parkes, sugar-wallace

quote: I don't know. There's just something kind of mortifying to me about the intensity of those feelings. I remember them so clearly.
author: Becky Albertalli, Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda

quote: You don't have to apologize for your feelings. You can't make yourself fall in love with somebody.
author: Jessica Spotswood, Wild Swans

quote: Whatever he's feeling at a given moment is what he's always been and always will be feeling.
author: Garth Risk Hallberg, City on Fire

quote: People cry, not because they're weak, it's because they've been strong for too long.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: People can show false love But cant false HatePeople can show false caring But cant false carelessSo believe on it they show you hate and treat you careless ,.It is true feelings
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: The most easy and simple thing to do in world is to say someone I Love You.And most difficult thing to do is keep on yourself on your these 3 words.
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: Love is a feeling which you can't change but its change you,Beloved is a person whom you can't replace with anyone but you replace your wishes with his or her wishes
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: I love her more than just a little. I think it's because we're both somewhat broken, in our own odd ways. More importantly, we're both aware of it.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Slow Regard of Silent Things

quote: And why love things you were destined to lose? Why let yourself feel things if the feelings were doomed to die?
author: Garth Risk Hallberg
tags: breakups, city-on-fire, doomed, feelings, garth-risk-hallberg, starcrossed-lovers, unrequited-love, we-want-what-we-can-t-have

quote: If you never bother to say the words, why should anyone believe you ever felt them?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: express-how-you-feel, expressing-yourself, expression-of-true-feelings, feelings, love, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: I love you every day -for the code and the blushand the shrug of it. Make your mind up in me, and I will do the same.
author: Jacob Mcarthur Mooney, Don't Be Interesting: Poems

quote: If only a stare can kill, I'm already a murderer.
author: Mary Ann Venancio

quote: Concepts such as loving kindness should never be used as weapons against our real feelings.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection
tags: conflict, feelings, love, loving-kindness, metta, mindfulness, mindfulness-practice, real-love

quote: Feelings are fleeting, no matter how eart-shattering they seem; they never last, always change.
author: Gena Showalter, Firstlife

quote: I'll say that for all the good things, all the great things, the super wow things it can do, the heart is kind of an asshole. The strongest feelings we have are never when things are stable, never when things are solid, never when we can handle things. The sharpest feelings are when things are either super good or super bad, as if the heart only ever wants to add gasoline to a fire. And the heart has all the subtlety of a freight train. It's going to hit you, and it's going to hit you hard.
author: Dennis Liggio, Jabberwock Jack

quote: My words express my feelings but not more than my heart.
author: Manish Upadhyay

quote: People think they know what you're feeling. What you must be feeling. And because it's easier not to expose yourself, what you're truly feeling, you don't disabuse them. You go through the motions for them.
author: Sue Miller, The Lake Shore Limited

quote: She wanted to hug him and at the same time she kind of wanted to slap him.
author: Liane Moriarty, Truly Madly Guilty

quote: I feel more, hence I speak less!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: If someone tells me that I've hurt their feelings, I say, 'I'm still waiting to hear what your point is.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: None of them are real to me.” He paused again, placing a hand flat against the door. “You are the only real thing in my life.”Radu gasped with the sheer physical pain the words sent through him. But the sound of his agony was covered by that of the door opening. Mehmed reached in and pulled Lada out to him, and then his mouth was on hers and his hands were in her hair and he was holding her so tightly, so tightly, and they stumbled back into Lada’s room and closed the door.Radu tripped forward, feet dragging, until he stood outside the room. He wanted to be inside it. He wanted to be the only real thing to Mehmed, just as Mehmed was the only real thing to him.He wanted—No, please, no.Yes.He wanted Mehmed to look at him the way he had looked at Lada.He wanted Mehmed to kiss him the way he had kissed Lada.He wanted to be Lada.No, he did not. He wanted to be himself, and he wanted Mehmed to love him for being himself. His question, the question of Mehmed, was finally answered, piercing him and leaving him shaking, silent, on the floor.He did not want this answer.
author: Kiersten White, And I Darken
tags: feelings, heartbroken, intimate, jealous, kissing, lada-dragwlya, mehmed, radu, real, realization

quote: People can say crap. They can think whatever they want, but you control how you feel about it.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, The Problem with Forever

quote: One of the dwarfs walked in front of Thor to get a better view of the prye, and Thor kicked him irritably into the middle of the flames, which made Thor feel slightly better and made all the dwarfs feel much worse.
author: Neil Gaiman, Norse Mythology
tags: dwarf, dwarfs, feelings, fire, flames, murder, prye, thor

quote: My fiancé immediately began to look uncomfortable, but did not voice this discomfort except by a soft gurgling sound in the throat . . . The gurgling escalated, but my mother politely switched on the dishwasher, and soon we heard mostly the sound of machinery rather than that of a person's feelings surfacing.
author: Alexandra Kleeman, Intimations: Stories
tags: alexandra-kleeman, commentary, feelings, intimations, metaphor, repression, satire, social-mores

quote: I find it increasingly difficult to speak of my feelings at will.
author: Alexandra Kleeman, Intimations: Stories

quote: The point is that we can't behave right when we don't feel right. And kids can't behave right when they don't feel right. If we don't take care of their feelings first, we have little chance of engaging their cooperation. All we'll have left going for us is our ability to use greater force. And since we'd like to reserve brute force for emergencies such as yanking children out of traffic, we've got to face this feelings thing head-on.
author: Joanna Faber, How to Talk so Little Kids Will Listen: A Survival Guide to Life with Children Ages 2-7

quote: You make it sound so terrible. There’s nothing wrong with crying. Tears are healing. They help you drain out the sorrow and anguish, so you can start filling yourself with more positive emotions, when you’re ready.
author: Kyla Stone, Beneath the Skin

quote: I want to feel embarrassed by my desperation but I’m too busy feeling desperate.
author: Marley Jacobs, Goodnight, Nic

quote: It is not yet a feeling that points her in a direction. It is just the feeling of a vacuum, a void waiting to be filled.
author: Eleanor Catton, The Rehearsal

quote: Do you feel something when you touch a tree, when you sit on a field of grass, when you put your hand inside the water in the river, when you look at the sky during the day and during night, when the wind blows at us, when you look at your fellow human beings and animals and see a vast universe in them....When you stand in the middle of nowhere and feel life,if whenever you do any of these actions and you feel tingling up your chest then be glad.Very few people feel it today in this fast life..... You are a very special kind of a human being who is not caged.Make sure you don't forget to feel.
author: Alamvusha (The forgotten paradigm of feeling)

quote: I don't want to hurt i will not hurt. don't hurt me.Its is really easy to hurt somebody but make her feel unique feel special feel alive this worth more then any of the richness in the world.
author: Demonnova
tags: feelings, hurt, life, love, precious, richness

quote: Feelings are not facts
author: Anonymous

quote: We argue, as you know. I don't think she like me, but so what. I say how I feel. Feelings. That's all we have as human beings.' - Tommy
author: Greg Sestero, The Disaster Artist: My Life Inside The Room, the Greatest Bad Movie Ever Made

quote: If Harrison was unable to see that I had feelings for him (at least five, but sometimes as many as seven) then he wasn't as smart as I thought he was – as I knew he was.
author: Carrie Fisher, The Princess Diarist

quote: How...how do you feel about me?”“I think it’s pretty obvious.”“Let’s just say I need a detailed account.”His lashes lifted and his eyes met mine. “I can do that for you.”“Okay.” I leaned toward him.“I never once stopped thinking about you when you were taken away. Four years. All I could hope was that you were in a good place. Never expected you to walk into school. Didn’t even allow myself to dream about that. And then you did, and seeing you blew me away. You were just like I remembered, but different. The hints of the girl I saw in you when we were younger were now right in front of me. The moment you said my name—the moment you hugged me I knew.” Rider reached between us, folding his hand around mine. “I knew I’d fall in love with you and I did. I love you, Mallory.”My lips parted on an inhale. “What?”“I love you, and not the kind of love we had for each other when we were younger, you know? Paige knows that. So does Hector. So did Jayden. I love you.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, The Problem with Forever
tags: fall-in-love, feelings, i-love-you, love, mallory-dodge, rider-stark

quote: My Christmas wish: To feel your arms around me, to have your lips on mine, and to hold you close one more time, while there's time.
author: D.S. Mixell
tags: christmas, close, feelings, hold, hugs, kiss, love, romance, time, wish

quote: Feelings are feelings, no matter when they happen. Our bodies don't stop being ours just because worse things happen to other people.
author: Foz Meadows, An Accident of Stars

quote: To improve your looks, to feel powerful and inspire others; just SMILE
author: Val Uchendu
tags: attitude-quotes, feelings, inspiration, inspirational-quotes, looks, powerful, smile-quotes

quote: Your feelings have a natural shelf life.
author: Deborah Sandella

quote: My homeland,' says the guest, 'no longer exists. My homeland was Poland, Vienna, this house, the barracks in the city, Galicia, and Chopin. What’s left? Whatever mysterious substance held it all together no longer works. Everything’s come apart. My homeland was a feeling, and that feeling was mortally wounded. When that happens, the only thing to do is go away.
author: Sándor Márai, Embers

quote: Love that is fueled solely by feelings will suddenly find itself out of gas on a long road with no gas stations.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
tags: emotions, feelings, fueled, gas, love, loved, road, shallow, station, superficial

quote: Sometimes I’m irrational, I know I am, but even irrational thought feels very, very real when you’re in the middle of shit.
author: Kim Holden, So Much More

quote: Being a parent is one of the best, stressful, guilty, rewarding, sad, happy, frustrating, cherished, disgusting, fun, ridiculous, time consuming, joyful, maddening, worrisome, hectic, magical, nostalgic, second guessing, warm, cuddly, thing one can spend the rest of their life doing. I wouldn't have it any other way!
author: Brenda Lochinger
tags: emotional, feelings, joyful, kids, love, parenting

quote: The right seeks release from liberal notions of what they should feel--happy for the gay newlywed, sad at the plight of the Syrian refugee, resentful to pay taxes. The left sees prejudice.
author: Arlie Russell Hochschild, Strangers in Their Own Land: Anger and Mourning on the American Right

quote: Feelings are best left concealed. They can bite you if you're not careful. They can eat you alive.
author: Alice Hoffman, Faithful

quote: Bianca?”Startled, I focused on Toby again. “Hmm?”“Are you all right?” he asked.My fingers had been toying with the little B charm around my neck without my realizing it. Immediately I dropped my hand to my side. “I’m fine.”“Casey warned me that you’re probably lying when you say that,” he said.I gritted my teeth and searched the dance floor for my so-called friend. She was being added to my hit list.“And I think she’s right,” Toby sighed.“What?”“Bianca, I can see what’s going on.” He glanced over his shoulder at Wesley before turning back to me with a little nod. “He’s been staring at you since he got here.”“Has he?”“I can see him in the mirrors over there. And you’ve been staring back,” Toby said. “It’s not just tonight either. I’ve seen the way he looks at you during school. In the hallways. He likes you, doesn’t he?”“I… I don’t know. I guess.” Oh God, this was uncomfortable. I just kept spinning my straw between my fingers and watching the little waves that appeared on the surface of my drink. I couldn’t meet Toby’s gaze.“I don’t have to guess,” he said. “It’s pretty obvious. And the way you look at him makes me think you’re in love with him, too.”“No!” I cried, releasing my straw and glaring up at Toby. “No, no, no. I am not in love with him, okay?”Toby gave me a small smile and said, “But you do have feelings for him.”I couldn’t see any sign of pain in his eyes, just a touch of amusement. That made it a lot easier to give him an answer. “Um,… yeah.”“Then go to him.”I rolled my eyes without meaning to. It was just so automatic. “Jesus, Toby,” I said, “that sounds like a line out of a bad movie.”Toby shrugged. “Maybe, but I’m serious, Bianca. If you feel that way about him, you should go over there.
author: Kody Keplinger, The DUFF: Designated Ugly Fat Friend
tags: bianca-piper, feelings, fine, go, in-love, staring, toby-tucker, wesley-rush

quote: Falling in love with someone doesn’t mean you know any better how they feel. It only means you know how you feel.
author: David Levithan, Every Day

quote: In the quagmire of feelings and emotions that engulf us on our drab and monotonous days and starry, resplendent nights, the ones that bring back past memories hold a special place, almost a unique pedestal, in our hearts! The distinct fragrance of nostalgia that serenades us in our minds is incomparable and is akin to a feeling of ecstasy. A feeling that hovers in our minds for a humongous period of time, one that takes us to leviathan heights in the midst of chaos and cacophony. It is as if we found a new elixir that rejuvenates us and makes us spring back into life.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: You know it’s true.”“Even if it is,” I cried, “what does it matter? You could sleep with anybody, Wesley. So what if I walk away? So what if I have feelings for you? I was just a screw to you! You would never actually commit to me. You could never commit to anyone, but especially not to Duffy. You don’t even find me attractive.”“Bullshit,” he growled, his eyes on my face as he moved closer to me again.He was so close. My back was pressed to the wall, and Wesley stood only inches away. It had only been a week, but it felt like ages since we’d been in this kind of proximity. A shiver ran up my spine as I remembered the way his hands felt on me. The way he’d always made me feel wanted, even if he had called me the Duff. Did he? Did he find me attractive despite the nickname? How? Why?“Then why would you call me that?” I whispered. “Do you know how much it hurts? Every time you call me Duffy, do you know how shitty it makes me feel?”Wesley looked surprised. “What?”“Every time you call me that,” I said, “you’re telling me how little you think of me. How ugly I am. God, how can you possibly find me attractive when you put me down all the time.” I hissed the last words through gritted teeth.“I didn’t-” His eyes fell, staring at his shoes for a moment. I could tell he felt guilty. “Bianca, I’m sorry.” He looked into my eyes again. “I didn’t mean-” His hand reached out to touch me.“Don’t,” I snapped, shrugging away from him. I slid to the side and stepped away from the wall. I wasn’t going to be cornered. I wasn’t going to let him have the power here. “Just stop, Wesley.”It didn’t matter if some part of him found me attractive. That didn’t change things. I was just another girl he’d slept with. One among many.“I didn’t mean anything to you,” I told him.“Then why am I here?” he demanded, turning to face me again. “Why the hell am I here, Bianca?
author: Kody Keplinger, The DUFF: Designated Ugly Fat Friend
tags: attractive, bianca-piper, duff, duffy, feelings, true, wesley-rush

quote: Frederick expected that he would have felt spasms of joy; but the passions grow pale when we find ourselves in an altered situation; and, as he no longer saw Madame Arnoux in the environment wherein he had known her, she seemed to him to have lost some of her fascination; to have degenerated in some way that he could not comprehend—in fact, not to be the same. He was astonished at the serenity of his own heart. © Project Gutenberg /... sentimentele slăbesc cînd le schimbi locul...
author: Gustave Flaubert, Sentimental Education

quote: Those who indulge themselves in sense stimulation throughout their lives often end up exhausted, with an enfeebled will and little capacity to love others.
author: Eknath Easwaran

quote: The sun was boiling, the swaying was uncomfortable, the horse stank. She felt wonderful
author: Peter F. Hamilton, The Reality Dysfunction

quote: The rising strong reckoning has two deceptively simple parts: (1) engaging with our feelings, and (2) getting curious about the story behind the feelings--what emotions we're experiencing and how they are connected to our thoughts and behaviors.
author: Brené Brown, Rising Strong

quote: I think Nesta feels everything— sees too much; sees and feels it all. And she burns with it. Keeping that wall up helps from being overwhelmed, from caring too greatly.
author: Sarah J. Maas, A Court of Mist and Fury

quote: Feelings are great, and they have a purpose, but it’s certainly not to guide your life. Whoever said, “Follow your heart” was a fool. Your “heart” is your emotional center. Emotions have a great purpose - to allow us to enjoy life, to mourn loss, to have a tangible way to experience love - but feelings are fickle, and they are not meant to be the guiding force in our life.
author: Josh Hatcher, Manlihood: The 12 Pillars of Masculinity
tags: emotion, emotions, feelings, fickle, guidance, guiding, love, manhood, mourning, passivity

quote: She kills her words, but somehow the feeling survives. And no matter where she buries them, he always sees them in her eyes.
author: Seekerohan, Caged: The Price of Pride
tags: caged, feelings, forever-love, hide, love, soulmates

quote: Life would be a darned sight simpler if feelings were as easy to patch up as a piece of sailcloth.
author: Harry Haskell, Maiden Flight: A Novel

quote: Feelings are relative. And at the root, they're all the same, even if they grow from different experiences and exist on different scales.
author: Becky Chambers

quote: I'm seeing someone."It gets quiet enough to hear our breathing."You're dating someone?" Aidan asks, sitting back down in my chair. Nadia retakes her spot on my mattress.I glance down at my hands, feeling my cheeks redden. "Not dating, really. It's more like I have feelings I haven't told her about yet.""Do we know her?"I shake my head."Who is she?" Nadia inquires. I glance up and instantly hate the look of rejection on her face,The lies flow out of me too easily. "Her name's Ivy. She lives over in Harraway with her parents.""Is she our age?""Yeah. She's only a year o
author: Colleen Boyd, Swamp Angel
tags: aidan, beautiful, dating, disappointment, feelings, ivy, like, nadia, new-feelings, rylan

quote: It’s the sensation that gives rise to ego or personal identity. All the external and internal experiences of life are experienced only with the sensation.
author: Roshan Sharma
tags: ego, emotions, feelings, identity, individuality, sensation, touch

quote: It is important to recognize guilt as the temporary teacher it is.
author: Rebekah Elizabeth Gamble, The Talking Stick Diaries: Embody Your Power
tags: emotion, empowering, feelings, guilt, inspirational, moving-on

quote: Facts & figures go to the brain. And, the brain tends to forget . Stories go straight to the heart. They make us feel. And, the heart remembers.
author: Dawn Gluskin

quote: Frederick expected that he would have felt spasms of joy; but the passions grow pale when we find ourselves in an altered situation; and, as he no longer saw Madame Arnoux in the environment wherein he had known her, she seemed to him to have lost some of her fascination; to have degenerated in some way that he could not comprehend—in fact, not to be the same. He was astonished at the serenity of his own heart./... sentimentele slăbesc cînd le schimbi locul...
author: Gustave Flaubert, Sentimental Education

quote: I'm not a mess but a deeply feeling person in a messy world. I explain that now, when someone asks me why I cry so often, I say, 'For the same reason I laugh so often--because I'm paying attention.' I tell them that we can choose to be perfect and admired or to be real and loved. We must decide.
author: Glennon Doyle Melton, Love Warrior

quote: The person she liked best didn't like her enough to want more of her, and she didn't want to pretend that wasn't awful.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Summer Days and Summer Nights: Twelve Love Stories

quote: 28. Feelings are neither right nor wrong. It's what you do with them that causes the problems.
author: James C. Dobson, Life on the Edge: The Next Generation's Guide to a Meaningful Future
tags: are, causes, do, feelings, it-s, neither, nor, problems, right, that, the, them, what, with, wrong, you

quote: Be careful of your mood and feelings, for there is an unbroken connection between your feelings and your visible world.
author: Rhonda Byrne, The Power

quote: Her feelings were very acute, and too little understood to be properly attended to. Nobody meant to be unkind, but nobody put themselves out of their way to secure her comfort.
author: Jane Austen, Mansfield Park

quote: Waves of my feelings are crossing the beach of my heart.
author: Tanmaya Guru

quote: When your focus is on how you feel about things in the world then the things of the world slip from view, your little boat of learning things for what they are are swamped by the swells of how you feel about them. With hard work and with learning, the things of the world are still somehow out there, waiting for you to know about them, no matter how you feel. They survive how you feel about them and they are there before and after the storms of your feelings roar through and abate. Feelings aren't much of a compass to go by.
author: Stephen Jenkinson, Die Wise: A Manifesto for Sanity and Soul
tags: cult-of-the-individual, ego, feelings, generation-snowflake, individuality, inspirational, narcissism

quote: Man is mostly a collection of emotions, most of which he would do better not to be feeling.
author: Neel Burton

quote: Life's but a walking shadow, a poor player,That struts and frets his hour upon the stage,And then is heard no more. It is a taleTold by an idiot, full of sound and fury,Signifying nothing.
author: William Shakespeare, Macbeth

quote: Young people feel things so deeply, don't they?' she said quietly, almost to herself. 'Everything's happening for the first time.
author: Tommy Wallach, Thanks for the Trouble

quote: As if a great creature had grown old without being able to express its feelings. Not that it didn't know how to express them, but rather it didn't know what to express.
author: Haruki Murakami, A Wild Sheep Chase

quote: These felt very much like last moments.
author: China Miéville, This Census-Taker

quote: Then I remembered how she was - fiery, ruthless, smart, and despite herself very caring, not a person who hurts anyone.
author: Mike Bond, Killing Maine
tags: caring, feelings, fiery, hurt, killing-maine, person, ruthless, smart, woman

quote: Roaming is the easiest part, just wandering around, looking the places, imagining how people lived there at that time, breathing deeply the open air around there and feeling the best.
author: Shaikh Ashraf, Friendship, Love & Sacrifice
tags: breathing, feelings, imagining, roaming, travelling, wandering

quote: I've Learned To Accept that one is never as great or terrible as they are made to feel, and the truth lies somewhere in between.
author: K.J. Kilton

quote: In the aftermath, she (Misty) still felt as though she were floating and as Leone shifted back from her she leant over him, silver-grey eyes bright with emotion, and whispered, ‘I died and went to heaven the day I found you.’ A wolfish grin of appreciation slashed his wide, sensual mouth. ‘Are you sure you’re feeling all right? You don’t sound at all like yourself.’ ‘Enjoy it while it lasts,’ she advised, happiness flooding through her as he curved her close and pressed a slow, sweet kiss to her reddened mouth. ‘I didn’t realise I’d found heaven until I stumbled into hell,’ Leone traded feelingly.
author: Lynne Graham, The Disobedient Mistress

quote: I started writing a story twenty years ago..yet remain unfinished until this time..'.couldn't not think how I end this story because it covers entirely pain, grief, and sorrow... If one story like this, how should it end...?
author: J.B. AC

quote: Good things have different colors, it’s like a rainbow or flowers and it’s more likely how I feel for my love ones that creates a joyous melody in my heart.How it makes me feel happy and alive
author: Bradley B. Dalina
tags: feelings, flowers, happiness, life, love, rainbow

quote: What you feel, you can heal.
author: John Gray
tags: emotions, feeling-things, feelings, healing, healing-abuse, healing-after-emotional-abuse, healing-insights

quote: So enjoy the exhilaration when it comes. Take the ride to the heights when you get the opportunity. But don't get hooked on the thrill of the moment. Take charge of your emotions. And when it comes time to do the right thing, don't let your feelings lead you to compromise. That is the way to live a happier, more successful life and one that is more pleasing to God.
author: James C. Dobson, Life on the Edge: A Young Adult's Guide to a Meaningful Future
tags: charge, comes, do, emotions, feelings, god, life, live, opporunity, pleasing, right, successful, thing, time

quote: My odd feelings of the other week seem to me quite ridiculous today: I can no longer enter into them.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre, Nausea

quote: Why the hell you have to feel bad! ... like " I am crazy"..... even if you are not !! many else out there .... feel the same in some point of time to be crazy enough, Hence.... let's just be practical and take light! "Be yourself to live the Life.
author: Praveen Chenna

quote: Those who feel nothing, gain nothing. Think about this. If you do not feel, your desires don't exist and cannot be rewarded.
author: R.A.Delmonico

quote: Then again, I was never any good at plumbing the depths of a woman's heart.
author: David Pilling, The Heretic

quote: I would like to care more about you than about my feelings for you.
author: Waylon H. Lewis, Things I Would Like To Do With You

quote: Are we looking for the absolute truth or the absolute feeling? Or the answer that best suits our personal needs?
author: Noah Cicero, Bipolar Cowboy

quote: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared, or anxious. Having feelings doesn’t make you a ‘negative person.’ It makes you human.
author: Lori Deschene

quote: I think it’s glorious to be nervous. Being nervous is great! How often do we get nervous on a daily basis? Being slightly nervous means you care, and you’re alive, and you’re taking some kind of risk. Hooray for being nervous! A friend told me to substitute the word ‘excitement’ for ‘nervous’. That way you acknowledge the physical feelings without putting a negative spin on things. So to answer your question, sometimes I still get so excited about ‘Update’ that I want to throw up
author: Amy Poehler
tags: alive, care, caring, excitement, feelings, nervous, nervousness, risk

quote: Robots get to see the worst of the human condition on a daily basis. Good thing they don’t have feelings.
author: Martin McConnell, Viral Spark

quote: Home does not have to be a place, but a feeling. Once one figures out how to find this feeling in multiple places they will always feel at home with them self.
author: Christian Latham

quote: Facing and embracing grief allows us to experience the shock, anger, disappointment, and other feelings that need to be processed before we can move through this transition.
author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg, The White Box Club Handbook: Simple Tools For Career Transition

quote: My heart was crazy now; it's too complicated to know what it was beating for, and how much of it was him and how much of it was the hunting - I think I cared about the deer that got shot - but it didn't matter then. Something was there and its source was irrelevant. It was so easy to feel nothing, all the time, and I held on as hard as I could, because the worst thing, I thought, now, would be for it to go away.
author: Patrick Somerville, The Universe in Miniature in Miniature

quote: Facts are never as salient as feelings.
author: Glenn Hodges

quote: It's a strange ache, that begins with a sudden flash of memory, while you are happily immersed in your favourite song or cooking your favourite dish - in the midst of just anything.An ache that suddenly drifts your energy, from enjoyment to controlling those tears scrolling down. All that swing in a wink, without the one next to you ever realising any sign of the sudden storm within you." Well, that's just the price you pay for choosing to feel.
author: Wordions

quote: Feelings are 'entertained'
author: love comes to pass. Feelings dwell in man
tags: but man dwells in his love.

quote: Note Worthy: Thought's of Victoria Short Story 3: Until Death Do Us Part. If you keep your mind busy, then you do not have time to stop and stop and feel all the pain and sadness. If you stay busy you do not think of all the countless memories that flood your mind. Because when those memories pop in your head all you wish for… all you ache for is to hold that person in your arms close. To squeeze them tight and never let go. Only you can’t. You never can ever again. No matter how bad you want too.
author: Brenda Lee Compton, God's Amazing Grace: A Collection of Inspirational Poems and Stories

quote: ... You have a heart and nerves the same as your brother men! Why should you be anxious to conceal them?
author: Emily Brontë, Wuthering Heights

quote: Angels are not beings with wings
author: they are feelings that give us wings.

quote: An author's job is to make you aware of your feelings while you continue to feel them.
author: Vanshicca Dhyani

quote: feelings existed in only one form: magnified.
author: Kimberly McCreight
tags: exist, existed, feel, feeling, feelings, form, magnified, magnify

quote: Though I no longer presumed to have a conscience, I have never once lacked feelings.
author: Lyndsay Faye, Jane Steele

quote: Yet he understood that there are some things you feel and others that you choose to feel, and that the choice doesn't make the feeling less valid.
author: Marie Rutkoski, The Winner's Kiss

quote: We were created with more than five senses. Apart from the basic five, we also have the gut and the third eye. The gut being the seat of all feeling, and the third eye being the seat of intuition (foresight).
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
tags: emotions, eye, feeling, feelings, five-senses, foresight, gut, intuition, intuitive, senses, sensing, seven-senses, stomach, suzy-kassem, third-eye, wisdom

quote: Feelings do not always determine truth, but they can sometimes tell you what is true.
author: J.R. Rim
tags: always, feel, feelings, guide, gut-feeling, intuition, sign, sometimes, symbol, true, truth

quote: Nights
author: are belong to the universe that speaks about an unspoken feelings into a poetry.

quote: Although our feelings may at times seem like a major inconvenience, especially when it comes to our digestive health, when you pay attention your gut can be a source of excellent psychic information.
author: Catherine Carrigan, Unlimited Intuition NOW

quote: I have tried to be very rational, although I know love and hate are not rational and explained feelings.
author: F. Sionil Jose'

quote: Generally the rational brain can override the emotional brain, as long as our fears don’t hijack us. (For example, your fear at being flagged down by the police can turn instantly to gratitude when the cop warns you that there’s an accident ahead.) But the moment we feel trapped, enraged, or rejected, we are vulnerable to activating old maps and to follow their directions. Change begins when we learn to "own" our emotional brains. That means learning to observe and tolerate the heartbreaking and gut-wrenching sensations that register misery and humiliation. Only after learning to bear what is going on inside can we start to befriend, rather than obliterate, the emotions that keep our maps fixed and immutable.
author: Bessel A. van der Kolk, The Body Keeps the Score: Brain, Mind, and Body in the Healing of Trauma
tags: brain, complex-ptsd, complex-trauma, emotions, feelings, gut-wrenching, healing-abuse, healing-insights, healing-the-emotional-self, healing-the-past, humiliation, misery, trauma, trauma-therapy, traumatized, world-view

quote: you brought other people close. look at me, i am still the same i was before ; having just two best friends in my case.and you are not happy with me. you hold grudges. So then free yourself. Remove this tag of best friend and feel free.
author: shivangi lavaniya

quote: Hence the migratory bird was about to leave then the other bird just querked and weeped
author: shivangi lavaniya

quote: Do you really want to know how I feel?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Feelings are murky, contrived and confusing. And the worst thing about them is no matter how hard you try, you can never sort them. They tangle more and more with thinking.
author: Saru Singhal

quote: Emotions serve as our guiding system. They tell us what we feel about something. This indicates the degree of alignment with the source's energy.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: Understand that it's definitely okay to cry. It's definitely okay not to be strong. It's definitely okay to not know the answers to all of your questions. But it's most definitely okay to feel emotions that you've never felt before. After all, we're not invincible, just human. And since we're human, we should have feelings unlike a robot. So if you ever wanna cry, then go cry a river, and then build a bridge. If you ever want to feel weak, go ahead, but then pick yourself up again.
author: Ada Huang & Anonymous

quote: She fitted in my arms, she always had, and the shock of holding her caused me to feel that my arms had been empty since she had been away.
author: James     Baldwin, Giovanni's Room
tags: arms, empty, feelings, hug, love, woman

quote: Is true, you do feel better about things the further you run from it
author: Marlon James, A Brief History of Seven Killings

quote: I tell you I must go!” I retorted, roused to something like passion. “Do you think I can stay to become nothing to you? Do you think I am an automaton?—a machine without feelings? and can bear to have my morsel of bread snatched from my lips, and my drop of living water dashed from my cup? Do you think, because I am poor, obscure, plain, and little, I am soulless and heartless? You think wrong!—I have as much soul as you,—and full as much heart! And if God had gifted me with some beauty and much wealth, I should have made it as hard for you to leave me, as it is now for me to leave you. I am not talking to you now through the medium of custom, conventionalities, nor even of mortal flesh;—it is my spirit that addresses your spirit; just as if both had passed through the grave, and we stood at God’s feet, equal,—as we are!
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: I wanted to tell him not to cry anymore, tell him that what those boys did to that bird didn’t matter. But I knew it did matter. It mattered to Dante. And, anyway, it didn’t do any good to tell him not to cry because he needed to cry. That’s the way he was.
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz, Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe

quote: Your instincts may tell you that you can’t survive if you experience feelings. But they are leftover child instincts. They’re the ones that first told you to freeze your feelings. They themselves are frozen and haven’t grown with the rest of you. These instincts don’t know that you’re far more capable of learning to cope with overwhelming emotion now than when you were a [child].
author: Maureen Brady
tags: abuse-survivors, emotional-wounds, emotionally-compromised, feelings, freeze, frozen-in-time, healing-insights, numb, numbness, recovery, recovery-from-abuse, survivors, unemotional

quote: Yimello,' said Bernard finally, breaking the silence.'Gesundheit?' I asked.'It's a name for one of the colors that's invisible to us. Yimello," said Bernard. "There could also be glowl and novaly and replitz."'Yes.' I nodded, stunned the kid could actually string together so many words at once. 'And, uh, don't forget the beautiful grynn, the luminous dulloff, or the subtle winooze.'Bernard's face lit up. He stood and started pacing the room, speaking quickly. 'Or salty, and insomnia, and carefree, and talkative, and lonely, and burnt, and punctual.''Some of my favorite colors,' I agreed, nodding. 'We could paint this room whisper. Or zigzag. Or maybe a nice shade of ignored and invisible.
author: Michelle Cuevas, Confessions of an Imaginary Friend
tags: burnt, carefree, colors, dulloff, feelings, gesundheit, glowl, grynn, ignored, insomnia, invisible, lonely, luminous, novaly, painting, punctual, replitz, salty, shade, talkative, winooze, yimello, zigzag

quote: I imagine you come across a number of people who are disconcerted by the difference between what you do feel and what they fancy you ought to feel. It is fatal to pay the smallest attention to them.”“Yes,” said Harriet, “but I am one of them. I disconcert myself very much. I never know what I do feel.”“I don’t think that matters, provided one doesn’t try to persuade one’s self into appropriate feelings.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers, Gaudy Night
tags: aloofness, detachment, emotion, feelings, individuality, reserve, self-confidence, self-truth

quote: And there was something so artless in this smile that I had to smile back.
author: James     Baldwin, Giovanni's Room
tags: artless, back, emotions, feelings, homosexual, love, smile

quote: No more relationships ! No more wasting time !No more feelings !
author: Eyad Ayman Kaifi

quote: Being must be 'felt' it can not be 'thought.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Feelings came alive in Vicki for which the earth and sea had never taught her names.
author: Helen Wells, The Hidden Valley Mystery
tags: aviation, aviator, feelings, flying, plane, sky

quote: Is it love? I don’t know,” he said truthfully. “Sometimes I think I’m just addicted to him. Or that he’s cast some kind of horrible curse on me where I’m to follow him for the rest of my life, doomed to fall for his lies over and over again.
author: Bey Deckard, Caged: Love and Treachery on the High Seas

quote: And after that, I watched our house collapse in on itself and I spent some time lying in the rubble. Then I vanished completely. I wasn't here at all. Then you phoned.
author: Ali Smith

quote: It's how you felt. And feelings don't always make sense. That's why they're feelings - not thnkings, " I said, hoping she'd smile.
author: Erin Dionne, The Total Tragedy of a Girl Named Hamlet

quote: I loved Verti. Until she jumped. That is when I felt Vertigo.
author: James Hauenstein

quote: We needed no Shakespeare to feel -- though, perhaps, like the rest of the world, we needed him to express it.
author: Inazo Nitobe

quote: Paulie smiled slightly at this, as profanity had always felt to him like a seal of understanding, a shortcut to extreme feeling that people used when they needed it most.
author: Kathleen Alcott

quote: obsession either boosts up feeling or just blow iy off...
author: shivangi lavaniya

quote: Her gaze traveled across the western sky that was dotted with clouds and was held by the wintry looking sun, so pure, so lovely, and so impossible to touch. Sheila felt that that was how her love was - Out of reach, unquestionably warm, and as certain as the celestial ball.
author: Shampa Sharma
tags: emotion, feelings, inspiration, love, sky, sun, warm, winter

quote: To begin by always thinking of love as an action rather than a feeling is one way in which anyone using the word in this manner automatically assumes accountability and responsibility. We are often taught we have no control over our "feelings." Yet most of us accept that we choose our actions, that intention and will inform what we do. We also accept that our actions have consequences. To think of actions shaping feelings is one way we rid ourselves of conventionally accepted assumptions such as that parents love their children, or that one simply "falls" in love without exercising will or choice, that there are such things as "crimes of passion," i.e. he killed her because he loved her so much. If we were constantly remembering that love is as love does, we would not use the word in a manner that devalues and degrades its meaning.
author: bell hooks
tags: actions, actions-over-words, actions-speak-louder-than-words, crimes-of-passion, definition-of-love, falling-in-love, feelings, love, true-love

quote: I’m about to berate his tactics, to deny any feelings for him, when he cups the nape of my neck and presses his lips to mine, velvety soft. It’s nothing but a peck, yet the flavor of the tart he sampled lingers like a warm, savory bruise—an irresistible torment to the netherling within.He draws back and my skin glistens, radiant prisms reflected off his face and the cushions. I’m gripping his jacket lapels, yet I don’t even remember reaching fo
author: A.G. Howard, Ensnared

quote: Love isn't a choice. I can't control how I feel about him any more than I can control the sun in the sky. But what I can do is control what I do with those feelings.
author: Karina Halle, The Lie
tags: choice, control, feelings, karina-halle, love, the-lie

quote: At the risk of hurting your feelings, I think you should know that some kisses are more special than others.
author: Jessica Steele, Reluctant Relative
tags: feelings, hurt, kiss, kisses, snarky, special

quote: I think Mrs. Leidner seems happier already from just talking about it. That's always a help, you know. It's bottling things up that makes them get on your nerves.
author: Agatha Christie, Murder in Mesopotamia

quote: It was my first dead body and I waited for the appropriate feelings. I didn't know what feelings to expect, which was worse than realising that I had none.
author: John  Mole, It's All Greek to Me!: A Tale of a Mad Dog and an Englishman, Ruins, Retsina--and Real Greeks

quote: On a fulcrum in my chest, grief and relief are balanced in equal measure.
author: Nayomi Munaweera, What Lies Between Us

quote: Firefly, it is an act of bravery to feel your feelings. Oh, Meg would've loved that. It's an act of bravery to feel your feelings, even if your feelings are telling you to die.
author: Gayle Forman, I Was Here

quote: The tear is the language of the soul and the voice of the feeling.
author: Filippo Pananti

quote: Never ever play with the feelings of others. If you think you have played with the feelings of another and have won, you better think again — you might of won the game but you surely may have lost that person forever.
author: Angie karan

quote: We call them feelings because we feel them.
author: Karen Joy Fowler, We Are All Completely Beside Ourselves

quote: I don't sleep. I just let my body lie itself into numbness and lie to myself that I can't hear, see, or feel anything.
author: Will Advise, Nothing is here...
tags: body, feeling, feelings, functions, hearing, lie, lies, lying, nothing, numb, numbness, seeing, sleep, sleeping

quote: It takes only a bit of tragedy to destroy insta-love.
author: Mya Robarts

quote: People are wrong when they say things like, “I didn’t have time to think.” If you’re really worried, or really miserable, those feelings come welling up around the edges of the other things you’re doing, so that you are in the feelings even when you’re working hard at something else.
author: Diana Wynne Jones, Conrad's Fate

quote: Are you speaking your mind or expressing your feelings?
author: Ramana Pemmaraju
tags: expressing-yourself, expression, expression-of-true-feelings, feelings, feelings-and-emotions, speaking, speaking-your-mind

quote: But recognizing the ridiculousness of an emotion and being able to master it are two very different things, I'm finding.
author: Amy Engel, The Revolution of Ivy

quote: You see, until then I'd been driven. I'd had a true quest, a purpose beyond my function - and then suddenly, the quest was over. I felt... drained. Disappointed. Let down.Does that make sense? I had been sure that as soon as I had everything back I'd feel good. But inside I felt worse than when I stared.
author: Neil Gaiman, Preludes & Nocturnes
tags: disappointment, drained, emptiness, feelings, life, purpose, purpose-of-life, quest, sad-feeling, sense, sense-of-life

quote: Inner-freedom is less about feeling good and more about learning to develop a healthy and harmonious relationship with the variety of emotional states you're likely to occupy over the course of a lifetime.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't
tags: emotional-health, emotions, feelings, inner-freedom, inspiration, negative-feelings

quote: The feeling of resentment and inferiority is natural and nothing much can be done about it. What can be done is to think, where these feelings will lead you? If you want to be a winner in life, if you want to reach the top, then make sure that these feelings of resentment and inferiority lead you to nothing else but aspiration!
author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

quote: Empty is the perfect state of being. Nothing inside to anchor you. Nothing inside to chain you down, keep you from living your dreams. Empty, almost weightless, you are an eyelash afloat on a blink of breeze. You can rise about tension and worry, loosed from the grip of gravity. Adrift in thermal lift, you ride the wing of freedom and soar. Empty, you are Eve in Eden. Empty, you are what you were meant to be.
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: ...it’s so awesome to be Human; we have His ability to feel, we can choose what we want to see based on our feelings… and when we choose to see the goodness around us, we amplify it and increase it to its never-ending limits...
author: Jayendra Puri Goswami, The Creator's Child

quote: I think about and consider God's feelings before the people's or even my own.
author: Delano Johnson

quote: Our feelings are not there to be cast out or conquered. They’re there to be engaged and expressed with imagination and intelligence.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't
tags: emotional-competence, emotional-health, emotional-intelligence, emotional-versatility, feelings, inner-freedom, optimism, psychological-choreography

quote: The problem with feelings is neither that our moods fluctuate nor that our emotions seem to fail us. The greater dilemma is that most have only learned how to dance to one type of feeling.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't
tags: emotional-health, feelings, happiness, inspiration, inspirational-quotes, processing-emotions

quote: Sometimes my life is in gray color but sometimes it is just like a rainbow.
author: Pēteris Bitāns

quote: We must recognize that our frustrations are largely due to the fact that we have not learned how to "dance" to a large part of the emotional spectrum. Being emotionally versatile is like being a good dancer. Just as dancers must challenge themselves to master new moves with their bodies, we must challenge ourselves to learn new forms of psychological choreography.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't
tags: emotional-health, emotional-versatility, feelings, handling-emotions, happiness, inner-freedom, psychological-choreography

quote: Happiness is like a genre of music that nearly everyone knows how to dance to. Happiness has a very simple tempo, catchy phrasing, and memorable lyrics. It's the song at the wedding that makes everyone excited to run to the dance floor.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't

quote: Emotional versatility is the art of making peace with the entire emotional spectrum by honing your capacity to channel various feelings along creative and constructive lines. It is not about controlling or condemning your feelings. It's about conducting your feelings in a self-edifying way.
author: T.K. Coleman, Freedom Without Permission: How to Live Free in a World That Isn't
tags: emotional-freedom, emotional-intelligence, emotional-versatility, emotions, feelings, inner-freedom, inspiration, mental-freedom, psychological-choreography

quote: Thinking before writing how I feel. That's how I'm able to write all the lies and wrongs. How else can one write something like a fake smile ?
author: Muhammad Faizan Khan.

quote: One day it may feel as if energy and enthusiasm are quenched, feelings dried up and emotions scorched, love and affection tangled in a harsh and uninviting setting. Nothing seems to grow anymore. No seed. No flowers. No foreseeable hope. No conceivable prospects. Any blossom of expectation seems to have become an illusion and life appears to have come to a standstill. If no seed of loving care is sown in the untilled, abandoned land, no bud can come into flower. Singer Amy Winehouse felt like lying fallow in the ground of a wasteland "with tears dry, dying a hundred times, going back to black" and leaving eventually for a place of ultimate sorrow and heartbreak, for a point of no return. ( “Amour en friche” )
author: Erik Pevernagie
tags: affection, amy-winehouse, care, emotions, expectation, fallow, feelings, heartbreak, hope, illusion, life, love, point-of-no-return, sorrow, tears, wasteland

quote: Love is not about making promises but it's about believing, no matter how far you are or how frequently you talk, you know you both are made for each other
author: Anamika Mishra

quote: I think that I've been trying for a long time to feel like I am supposed to, instead of what I actually am.
author: Ava Dellaira, Love Letters to the Dead

quote: The more importance we place on avoiding unpleasant feelings in life, the more our life tends to go downhill.
author: Russ Harris, ACT with Love: Stop Struggling, Reconcile Differences, and Strengthen Your Relationship with Acceptance and Commitment Therapy

quote: Of all the women he knew, she had meant the most; and was the one person in his life he felt he had missed, in some ways.
author: Larry McMurtry, Lonesome Dove
tags: feelings, felt, he-knew, his-life, life, love, love-of-his-life, meant-the-most, missed, one-person, only-love, women

quote: For even the best err in words when they are meant to mean most delicate and almost inexpressible things.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: If we cannot all FEEL alike, we can all FEED alike on the Bread Life.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Morning and Evening, Based on the English Standard Version

quote: My chest ached, my body speaking a language my head didn't quite understand.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Shiver

quote: Are you all right?" The question surprised Jess, and it broke through his black shell enough to make him throw a look at his friend. "No." I didn't think you were. Everyone wants you to be. That must be worse, that they think you should be fine.
author: Rachel Caine, Ink and Bone

quote: Love is not about making promises but it is about believing
author: Anamika Mishra

quote: Realizing that you are in love is itself a beautiful feeling... And there is nothing like one-sided love or both-sided love. Love is simply love. Celebrate this feeling
author: Anamika Mishra

quote: Love is a natural feeling, hatred is an acquired one.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: I am the kind of person who, if my feelings are unrequited, can completely detach from someone emotionally if I simply put my mind to it.
author: Mindy Kaling, Why Not Me?

quote: Love is a complex, wild feelings that can't be tamed using the whip of what is right and what is not.
author: Mya Robarts, The V Girl

quote: ..the thing about depression. When I feel it deeply, I don’t want to let it go. Itbecomes a comfort. I want to cloak myself under its heavy weight and breathe it into my lungs. I wantto nurture it, grow it, cultivate it. It’s mine. I want to check out with it, drift asleep wrapped in itsarms and not wake up for a long, long time.
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: Feelings are much like waves. We can't stop them from coming but we can choose which one to surf.
author: Jonatan Mårtensson

quote: I don't get it - how you can feel like there are no consequences for living with your feelings on your sleeve.
author: Julie   Murphy, Side Effects May Vary

quote: The seed of all impulse is a feeling bursting to express itself in action.
author: Chloe Thurlow, Katie in Love

quote: I don't doubt that you think you love me
author: what I doubt is your understanding of love.

quote: Ultimately virility is all about helping others express their reluctantly shared feelings while doing so from a safe distance.
author: Ken Poirot, Go Viral!: The Social Media Secret to Get Your Name Posted and Shared All Over the World!
tags: author-ken-poirot, distance, express, expressing-oneself, expression, expression-of-true-feelings, feeling, feelings, feelings-and-emotions, from-a-distance, from-a-protected-distance, go-viral, go-viral-book, helping, helping-hand, helping-one-another, helping-others, helping-others-quote, helping-others-quotes, helping-people, inner-feeling, inner-feelings, ken-poirot, ken-poirot-quote, ken-poirot-quotes, protected-distance, protection-of-distance, reluctant, reluctantly, reluctantly-shared, reluctantly-shared-feelings, safe, safe-distance, safety, secret-feeling, secret-feelings, ultimately, viral, viral-content, viral-hit, viral-ideas, viral-marketer, viral-marketing, viral-marketing-material, viral-marketing-pieces, viral-marketing-quote, viral-marketing-quotes, viral-message, viral-quote, viral-qutoes, virility

quote: The human feelings, which had never been very deep in him, grew shallower every hour, and every day something more dropped away from the decrepit wreck.
author: Nikolai Gogol, Dead Souls

quote: Follow your heart, includes your responsibilities in everyday life; else heart will have only regrets at the end
author: Sandhya Jane, Second Spring
tags: feelings, inspirational-quotes, life-philosophy-inspirational, love, love-quotes, love-story, philosophy

quote: I believe having a healthy emotional will help in your ability to communicate and to connect to others. We have to learn how to express our feelings especially the negative ones.
author: Michael Barbarulo

quote: When we don’t have way to express our feelings then at odds in choosing way and every path of life shows gloomy image.
author: Faisal Hafeez Mughal
tags: at-odds, express, feelings, gloomy, image, path-of-life, pessimist

quote: The feeling that she was going to explode, that she was too big for her own skin.
author: Jodi Picoult, Salem Falls

quote: Love and hatred only deal with feelings
author: they do not understand (the) logic.
tags: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: Love doesn't measure that way... you may blame me for your feelings, but it isn't fair to blame me for how you've chosen to behave.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: I wish you could be kissed, Jane,” he said. “Because I would beg just one off you. Under all this.” He flailed an arm toward the stars.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Dream Thieves

quote: You are the ocean to my eyes.
author: Sanober  Khan
tags: calming, deep-love, eyes, feelings, indian-authors, love-quotes, ocean, peace, poetic, poetry, poetry-quotes, poets, soft, soothing

quote: let my heart always belike it is...this very momentready to explode...with lovea violent rainstorm...with no streamno ocean vast enoughto flow into.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence
tags: deep, deep-feelings, deep-thoughts, depth, feelings, flow, flowing, love-forever, love-quotes, ocean, personal, poetry, poetry-quotes, rainstorm, raw, storms, stream, tender

quote: I have no emotions. I just stand there, in the rubble of my life.This… this was my home. If it were a person, this would be a gaping chest wound, the kind no one can recover from.
author: Beth Revis, The Body Electric
tags: emotionless, feelings, home, life, rubble, wounds

quote: There is no guilt in feelings ever.
author: Erich Maria Remarque, Arch of Triumph: A Novel of a Man Without a Country

quote: The language of the universe comes not from the voice but from the primordial silence. You can understand it by enhancing your feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha
tags: debasish, debasish-mridha, feelings, inspirational, language-of-the-universe, mridha, philosophy, primordial-silence

quote: To sate your need without love is theft
author: Robin Hobb, The Mad Ship

quote: Feelings have the divine attracting power. Feelings are the only link between you and everything around you.
author: Debasish Mridha
tags: debasish, debasish-mridha, divine-attracting-power, feelings, inspirational, mridha, philosophy

quote: Like flowers to a bee, feelings are the silent language of the heart.
author: Debasish Mridha
tags: debasish, debasish-mridha, feelings, inspirational, language-of-the-heart, like-flowers-to-a-bee, mridha, philosophy

quote: He looked upwards at the brilliant blue sky. It was high noon because the sun was right overhead. The clouds danced around slowly, while drifting across the sky. He closed his eyes and felt the warmth of the sun glowing orange on his eyelids. It was a wonderful feeling.
author: Jason Medina, A Ghost In New Orleans
tags: a-ghost-in-new-orleans, closed-his-eyes, clouds, drifting, eyelids, feelings, happiness, jason-medina, memories, peaceful, peacefulness, relaxed, serenity, sky, state-of-mind, sun, sun-glow, sun-glowing, sun-glowing-orange, the-clouds-danced, tribal, tribal-publications-inc, visions, warm-feelings, warmth, wonderful-feelings

quote: Not a drop in her eye because the pain in her heart was too much to cry!
author: Sima Mittal

quote: I journaled: "Why do I feel like crap after being offered a book deal by one of the best publishers on the planet?" The answer that I came up with surprised me. I knew there were people who would have done anything to get their work out into the world this way. i knew there were people who had worked their butts off and still hadn't made it. I knew there were people who had amazing, life-changing things to say who didn't have the platforms to say it yet. I knew there were people who would have been doing cartwheels in the street if they were me right now. And I felt like because they wanted it more, they should have it instead of me.
author: Kate Northrup, Money, A Love Story: Untangling Your Finances, Creating the Life You Really Want, and Living Your Purpose

quote: Greatness in the making feels just like you feel right now. Time will soon tell.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim
tags: feel, feelings, great, greatness, inspirational, life, making, motivational, time, truth

quote: Mr. Ferris didn't say anything the whole time. He sat next to me and listened. And when I finished, I looked at him.He was crying. I'm not lying. He was crying.I don't think it was because how hard I hit him.I know how the Black-Backed Gull feels when he looks up into the sky.Maybe, somehow, Mr. Ferris does too.
author: Gary D. Schmidt, Okay for Now

quote: yes, I have feelingsand no, I’m not afraid of themnot even the shadowy onesthat you’d rather ignorei gather them inwelcome them homegive them space to breatheand light them on glorious firejust to seewhat might be illuminatedwhile they burn
author: Jeanette LeBlanc
tags: emotions, empath, empathy, feelings, sensitive, sensitivity

quote: Feelings are for the soul what food is for the body.
author: Rudolf Steiner, How to Know Higher Worlds: A Modern Path of Initiation

quote: Some people look for the obvious and make decisions based on that. However, sensitive people look for the subtle things in life. They observe what is missed, overlooked and rarely observed by others. They dwell at a deeper level of perception that clings to signs, body language and what is left unspoken. They are observers that will trust their instinct first over any fact or well delivered speech.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: caring, clues, connections, empathic, feeling, feelings, following-signs, gut, gut-instinct, hypersensitive, hypersensitivity, instinct, knowing, observers, signs

quote: That spring, Amelia takes Maya to the drugstore and lets her choose any polish color she likes. "How do you pick?" Maya says. "Sometimes I ask myself how I'm feeling," Amelia says. "Sometimes I ask myself how I'd like to be feeling.
author: Gabrielle Zevin, The Storied Life of A.J. Fikry

quote: It is these empty spaces you have to watch out for, as they flood up with feeling before you even realize what's happened.
author: Aimee Bender, Willful Creatures

quote: I feel lost and confused, but happy and certain. I am like a ball of tangled yarn. The parts that are untangled are available, useable; the rest is a mess, useless until it is untied. That mess feels endless and at most times unyielding.
author: Astrid Lee Miles, Recovering is an Art

quote: We learn to restrain ourselves as we get older. We keep apart when we have quarrelled, express ourselves in well-bred phrases, and in this way preserve a dignified alienation, showing much firmness on one side, and swallowing much grief on the other. We no longer approximate in our behaviour to the mere impulsiveness of the lower animals, but conduct ourselves in every respect like members of a highly civilised society.
author: George Eliot

quote: Dwelling on thoughts gives birth to feelings.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love is when your heart melts like butter on toast; when you feel lightheaded and free. Most of all, you feel an ache to be with them, to look at them and to touch them.
author: Astrid Lee Miles, Recovering is an Art

quote: I don't care about situations.i care about feelings
author: Sher E Yazdan

quote: Every time I go away from home seems first time.....
author: Ankit_pandey

quote: Do you ever think of me when you look up at the moon and the stars? When you look into the horizon as the sun sets? We're looking at the same sun, and the stars may burn brighter where you are, but I can't see them, and they're still there. I spend nights trying to see the stars that you see, but I end up seeing you in the stars instead.
author: Karen Quan, Write like no one is reading 2
tags: feelings, heartache, in-love, infatuation, love-sick, moon, quotes, stars, sun-set, wishing

quote: You make me feel like I am everywhere when I am right here, completely still with you.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2
tags: complete, emotion, falling-in-love, feelings, in-love, infatuation, love, love-quotes, new-relationship, on-top-of-the-world, whole

quote: I tell myself that with enough effort, I can control my feelings.
author: Colleen Hoover, Maybe Someday

quote: My existence began the day you were created and was realized the day we met.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2
tags: birthing, conception, emotional, feelings, instant-love, love, love-at-first-sight, motherhood, new-born, obsesses, quotes, writing

quote: If you wanna fly high with me you have to play blind on me !!
author: Wasim Malik

quote: It made me giddy. It made me blush, worse than before. It was like liquor. It made me drunk. I drew away. When her breath came now upon my mouth, it came very cold. My mouth was wet, from hers. I said, in a whisper,'Do you feel it?
author: Sarah Waters, Fingersmith
tags: drunk, feelings, fingersmith, first-kiss, kiss, liquor, love, lust, mouth, sarah-waters, touch

quote: No feeling is wrong. You have the right to your feelings. However, you do not need to wallow in them, and you do not have the right to act them out. The world hasn't suddenly become your punching bag or litter tray.
author: Anna Valdiserri

quote: There's always that one guy who gets a hold on you.
author: Jess Rothenberg

quote: It was different than all the rest because I say it was. I felt it was.
author: Katie Heaney, Never Have I Ever: My Life (So Far) Without a Date

quote: I have a very low eerie threshold.
author: Jandy Nelson, The Sky Is Everywhere

quote: I wasn't only hurt by love. I was ruined too.
author: Shahrukh Ahmad, Don't Tell You Want To Become An Entrepreneur

quote: The sharp light of the stars and moon sliced away her misconceptions and pared down their layers until the feelings that had always existed between them lay bare.
author: Katherine McIntyre, Solid Ground
tags: feelings, longing, misconceptions, moonlight, regret, shared-feelings

quote: you are here.the moontides are here.and that’s all that matters.
author: Sanober  Khan
tags: complete, deep-love, deep-thoughts, depth, feelings, feelings-of-love, forever, forever-love, fulfillment, i-love-you, indian-authors, love-quotes, moon, mystical, poems, poetry, poetry-quotes, profound, romance, soulmates, tides

quote: You were the poem I never knew how to write because no words could describe the wind you cannot see, but feel.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: beauty, feel, feelings, friendship, love, poems, poetry, poets, prose, wind

quote: I stumble and fall.I weep and struggle to rise.My mom feels it all.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: empathy, feeling-for-children, feelings, haiku, mom, moms, mother-s-love, motherhood, poetry, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, sympathy

quote: Feelings aren't right or wrong, they just are, and we can accept all feelingsno matter what they are...If you can take that in, it will free you up.
author: K.I.Lynn - Infraction

quote: If You Really Feel Beloved Pain Then Do Not Repeat Things Which cause of Pain Again
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari

quote: success and failure is like two sides of coin depends on your willingness.
author: Wasim Malik

quote: After he finished he said: If there is anything for you to learn, it's only that you should not be ashamed. Don't be ashamed to be a person with feelings. No matter what it is, feel it tenderly and deeply. Feel it more tenderly, feel it more deeply. Feel it for yourself. Feel it for others. And then: Let it go.
author: Milena Michiko Flašar, I Called Him Necktie

quote: Does anyone ever cry and you know you've been hurt.You know you should feel an achy feeling in your heart, but you feel nothing. You just cry, and can't stop?
author: Ayat Ibrahim

quote: She raised her head when she heard my step, and her gaze met my own, over the matron's dipping shoulder, and her eyes grew bright. I knew then how hard it had been to keep, not just from Millbank but from her. I felt that little quickening. It was just as I imagine a woman must feel, when the baby within her gives its first kick. Does it matter if I feel that, that is so small, and silent, and secret?
author: Sarah Waters, Affinity
tags: bright, eyes, feelings, gaze, love, lust, secrecy, secret
